job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: pWere united by a mission to make the world a safer place Corvus Insurance uses novel data and artificial intelligencemachine learning to achieve better insights into commercial insurance risk Our software empowers brokers and policyholders to better predict and prevent complex claims through datadriven tools and Smart Commercial Insurance policies This allows us to reduce or eliminate the impact of adverse events creating a safer world for everyone Drawing inspiration from the intelligent toolbuilding corvid family of birds we are a team of highflying collaborative builders Were excited to meet you Spread your wings and soar with usppbrppCorvus Insurance seeks a talented Machine Learning Engineer to join our Data Science team We are a dynamic team of entrepreneurial professionals with backgrounds in insurance and technology creating a commercial insurance company that combines the latest technology with traditional insurance You will be instrumental in building systems that identify and analyze actionable data for our users to consumeppbrppstrongResponsibilitiesstrongpulliAssist in applying machine learning to solve business problems such as identifying cyber insurance riskliliDevelop production grade systems to deploy machine learning applicationsliliDesign data pipelines to gather and store large quantities of cyber security dataliliManaging research ingestion and synthesis of new data sources including building and maintaining data infrastructureliliDrive engineering best practices across the data team including code reviews testing and reproducibilityliliYou will be an active creative team member that will help Corvus build our data productsliulpbrppstrongspan classqlcursorspanQualificationsstrongpulli15 Years of experience with Machine Learning Data Engineering Data Science or Software EngineeringliliPassion for and basic knowledge of Statistical and Machine Learning methodologiesliliAdvanced knowledge of Python Spark or similar toolsliliRelationalNonRelational database experience such as Redshift Postgres MySQL etcliliYou write readable quality codeliliExperience with the AWS stack or other cloud computing technologies a plusliliYou collaborate well with others and are dedicated to the companys successliulpbrppnbspppstrongOur CommitmentstrongppCorvus provides a seriously safe nest for people who come from all paths Our flock represents a variety of backgrounds perspectives and skills Although confidence can sometimes hold us back from applying for a job we believe theres no such thing as a perfect candidatenbspCorvus is a place where everyone can soar So however you identify and whatever background you bring please apply if this is a role that would make you excited to come into work every daynbspAnd please check out what its like to be a Corvid and our amazing benefitsnbsphttpswwwcorvusinsurancecomlifeatcorvusnbspppbrppstrongCovid19 ResponsestrongnbspWe look forward to inviting Corvids into our offices when its safe and they are comfortable That said Corvus has always embraced a hybrid work environment with a flexible policy that empowers our employees to decide what is best for their own health and wellbeing Were committed to continuing this environment into the futureppbrppCorvus is committed to providing reasonable accommodations for individuals with disabilities If you need assistance or an accommodation with our hiring process due to a disability contact us at 8572593995 or careerscorvusinsurancecomnbspppbrppDisclaimer Bird puns are highly encouragedp
